attributes.action: introduce tax breaks to encourage the adoption of bio-fuels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current tax laws provide no incentive for drivers to use fuels derived primarily from renewable or carbon-neutral sources such as bio-ethanol.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "introduce tax breaks to encourage the adoption of bio-fuels"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11042.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/biofuel/

Environment Secretary Hilary Benn has written a message exclusively for people who recently signed petitions on the No10 website about climate change.

Mr Benn highlights the UK Government's commitment to seeking international agreement on a post-2012 climate change framework, and encourages petitioners, their families, and friends, to use the new CO2 Calculator.

Read the message here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13496.asp


Prime Minister's Office
